climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 300 Numbered Pages with Contents: By using page numbers and a 4-page blank table of contents, you can jot down important notes from various pages and note them in the front of the journal for easy and fast reference. Each page has a day and month header to help you keep track of the date.

Strong Metal Twin-wire & Durable Hardcover: Feature a super durable Golden double wire spiral binding with heavy-duty hardcover; making it easy to fold over and laying the notebook totally flat easily, giving you a better writing experience. The professional durable water-resistant hardcover will protect your journal to last for years.

100 GSM Ink-friendly Paper: The pages are very thick which avoids ink bleeding through and ghosting. Suitable for most pen types, such as ballpoint pens, fountain pens, gel pens, pencils and so on. Allowing you to write on both sides of every page to maximize your usable space.

Inner Pocket & Elastic Closure: Come with an elastic closure band, not allowing the notebook to open accidentally, so pages stay safe during transport. The back cover includes an expandable pocket for miscellany. Tabbed sticky notes and a handy pen loop holder are included.

Multiple Uses: Ideal for all office, school and home use including journaling, note-taking, drawing, goal setting, planning, and many more. A perfect gift choice for friends, family, classmates and colleagues!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 300 Numbered Pages and 4-page Contents: It’s easy to note and find what page related content is on.

100 GSM No Bleeding Paper Pens glide across the ultra-smooth ink-proof 100gsm acid-free paper. No worry of bleeding or page deformation. Expandable Inner Pocket Expandable inner pocket for stashing loose notes, business cards, receipts, or other small items. Tabbed Sticky Notes Great bookmark index for your journal, strong adhesive for to perfectly stick on your notebook.

Elastic Closure Band Have a elastic closure band to keep your notebook close when you don’t use it. Pen Loop Do not need to worry about finding your pen whenever you want to use diary. Twin Wire Spiral Binding Twin-wire Binding allows the pages to turn very easily, and lets the journal lay completely flat when open.
Specifications: Dimensions: 10.2 in (L), 7.8 in (W), 1.0 in (H) Binding type: Spiral Notebook Format: College Ruled Number of Pages: 300 Paper: 100GSM Paper

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love everything about this notebook. Quality, color, perfect size, line spacing, thick pages, NUMBERED pages, table of contents section, etc. I looked a long time for this before deciding on this one. It’s GOOD!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautifully well-made notebook!
reviews.reviewText: Beautifully well-made notebook! The cover is sturdy and waterproof. I love the fact that it has a printed table of contents, lines, and page numbers. Also, the other cool features are the non-bleed paper used for the pages, the elastic closure for the journal, the great pocket, and the sticky pad on the back of the journal. My daughter bought this one for herself which arrived yesterday. The same day I ordered (2) more journals as gifts for myself and again for my daughter (so now she has two journals in burgundy and black colors, mine is dark green). I definitely recommend buying this journal, well worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for notebook that would be sturdy enough to be my garden book. Would withstand trips to the green house, and this one really fits my needs. Sturdy cover, thick pages and it also has an index and pages are numbered. I will buy again when needed. Love, Love this notebook!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected!
reviews.reviewText: They’re larger and thicker than I thought they’d be, but these notebooks are GREAT quality! The cover is solid - even the pages are sturdy - and you can lay it totally flat thanks to the spiral binding, which makes writing a lot more comfortable. I love that there’s a spot to put the date (I’m using it as a journal) and the line spacing is perfect. Not too large not too small.I have the orange & the dark green - I just leave them out on my desk because they look so nice. They don’t get scuffed or smudged up easily either which is awesome!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A bit smaller than I expected, but nice and sturdy, which is what I needed. Others with the paper cardboard covers just get mangled. Love that it has a loop pen, pencil holder too. Very convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the color
reviews.reviewText: Love the color. I bought the forest green notebook and it's so pretty. I like that the pages are numbered. And the price is a plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 📚 Forvencer Spiral Journal Notebook: The Ultimate Ink-Proof Buddy 🖋️✨
reviews.reviewText: f you're tired of your journal being less of a partner and more of a nemesis in your quest for organization, then the Forvencer Lined Spiral Journal Notebook is here to save the day! 🦸‍♀️🦸‍♂️🔢 300 Pages with Contents: Finally, no more flipping through endless pages to find your brilliant ideas. Thanks to the numbered pages and a convenient table of contents, you can locate your genius in seconds. It's like having your own personal index finger in book form! ☝️📖📜 Durable and Foldable: This notebook has a backbone of steel (well, metal twin-wire) and a hardcore hardcover. It's as tough as a bouncer at a comedy club. Plus, it folds over and lays flat like a pancake, so you can write without any drama. 🥞💪🖊️ Ink-Friendly Pages: Say goodbye to the days of ink bleeding and ghostly apparitions on the other side of your paper. The 100 GSM paper in this journal is a fortress against ink invasions, welcoming all pens with open pages. 🖋️👻📦 Pocket-Sized Perks: The journal even has its own secret hideaway – an inner pocket for stashing your notes, ideas, and other treasures. Plus, an elastic closure band keeps your musings secure during transport. It's like a personal vault for your thoughts! 🗝️📝🎁 Perfect for Every Occasion: Whether you're taking notes at school, planning world domination, or just doodling your way through life, this journal has your back. It's also a fantastic gift for friends, family, or anyone who appreciates the art of note-taking! 🎓🎨🎉In conclusion, the Forvencer Spiral Journal Notebook is like the sidekick you never knew you needed – reliable, tough, and always ready for action. Say goodbye to journaling woes and hello to a world of organized, ink-friendly fun! 🌟📚😄

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my needs; durable; BEST of all: numbered pages
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for my project: cataloguing 20 years’ worth of information by date. Some dates, nothing. Others, a day could use a page, a week could use a page. BEST feature: numbered pages.After receiving this, I read each of the reviews below 5 stars. And, aside from defective notebooks, I’m baffled:1- The cover is very sturdy. The best I’ve had. Bends very slightly and with effort. Downside: It’s smooth and picks up fingerprints. A lot. Textured surface would fix.2- The spiral is probably the best I’ve seen for a book this size. I flipped through pages quickly and slowly with no problems. The person who reported the cover coming off, separating from coil must have received a defective book.3- The paper is indeed 100gsm (just compare to a piece of 100 gsm printing paper.)4- There are no tabs that come with it.The only flaw is the sizing. This is not a problem for me, but FYI:Seller says the paper is B5 ruled, however, in the bottom specs of the page “Technical Details” it says overall size is B5 with A5 sheets.Correct sizing:A5 = 5.82” x 8.26”B5 = 7.48” x 9.84”Alert:Google B5 paper and you’ll find at least 3 different sizes from 6.9 x 9.8, 7.17 x 10.12 and 7.48 x 9.84.What I received after ordering B5:Cover = 7.5 x 10.25Paper = 7-1/8 x 10-1/4
Excelente producto, solo que a la pasta se le marca cualquier cosa que la toque.Tendré que ser cuidadosa con eso 😄
ES UNA LIBRETA ELEGANTE, Y FUNCIONAL
